prompt.text:
New repository or package signing key received:
Repository: cloud-ptf Key Name: PTF repository signing key (autogenerated) <nobody@crowbar.b50.cloud.suse.de> Key Fingerprint: 00601359 44293214 42F7145F 4C67EFE9 E78747F9 Key Created: Tue Nov 8 11:20:15 2016 Key Expires: (does not expire) Rpm Name: gpg-pubkey-e78747f9-5821b4ef
Do you want to reject the key, trust temporarily, or trust always?

option.desc: Trust the key and import it into trusted keyring.
